page.title: 20A friend in Patchway
page.content: My best friend is a boy who is only two years old. I first met him when he and his mum came to my house. I am inviting him to my birthday party. When he comes he plays with me and my dog. he likes all my cars and is often playing with them. His favourite colour is yellow and his favourite book is a waterproof book about a frog. He is medium built and is about normal height. His dad works and lives abroad. Once Daniel came on a visit to Thornbury with me. His mum bought him a toy dog. He is not allowed to have army toys, because his mum does not like war. Project carried out by Callicroft Junior School Rodway Road, Patchway, Bristol
